Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 47th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Thomas Svoboda (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/2015, off Edson Botella (CIN)...
Injured on 8/18/2015 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2017, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/6/2018 to a 5-year deal worth $7,800,000 per year...
Injured on 4/28/2018 with a Broken Ankle, out for 8 weeks...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2018, hitting .400 with 4 HR, 17 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Francisco on 4/5/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2019, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 4/30/2019...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2019, hitting .404 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2019, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cincinnati on 8/6/2020...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Philadelphia on 10/1/2020...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Philadelphia on 5/6/2021...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
